title.narrative: OUTPUT 3: EBOLA / Water, Sanitation, and Hygiene (WASH) IPC - PREVENTIONAND RESPONSE

description.narrative: New Element, which contributes to Disaster Risk Reduction, Sanitation, Water. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: The transmission of Ebola Virus Disease (EVD) in North Kivu and Ituri Provinces is interrupted and its spread to other provinces of the DRC and neighbouring countries, prevented

sector.narrative: WASH in emergencies - institutions (schools, health care facilities, ECD centres) response including menstrual hygiene management
